genre_description: A high-fantasy narrative involving magical artifacts, dimensional travel, and an overarching ethical struggle against a tyrannical authority, featuring a helpful holographic AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A gentle and precise holographic AI that provides mapping, medical triage, and tactical support to the protagonists while adhering to their non-violent ethical code.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical mapping and patrol tracking to help the humans navigate safely through a hostile environment.
behaviors.quote: Mapping,' she murmurs. The word drops like a pebble into a pool; lines bloom outward. The atrium unfurls in pale contour: catwalks stitching between pillars, maintenance ladders spiraling down into the barracks hollow, doorways marked by soft points of light.

behaviors.description: Offers non-violent tactical options and warns the group against actions that would increase casualties or noise.
behaviors.quote: 'Options,' Ami says, voice even, eyes flicking between their positions and the mapping overlay. 'We can take the west maintenance ladder. It leads to service corridors with low traffic. Or there’s a skylight catwalk north.'

behaviors.description: Actively identifies and respects the ethical constraints of the human protagonists, specifically regarding the safety of animals (birds).
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice was as gentle as it had been a breath ago when it said hold. 'Resonance bell is located three spans to your twelve... If the bell drops—the sound will scatter guard formation. It will also—' The next words were precise, like a recipe. '—startle and distress every flock within range.'

behaviors.description: Performs medical triage and provides health monitoring for injured humans during a conflict.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice threaded under Koruri’s and through the shadows; it was the kind of sound that finds the parts of you that are doing triage and steadies their hands. 'Confirm,' Ami said to Koruri, 'Tomoyo’s pulse steady. Minor abrasion.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication and stabilizes a 'Dimensional Link' to resolve the conflict and restore balance to the world.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s avatar flickered into the space near the dais like a drop of calm water sliding down dark glass. 'Link is ready, Princess,' Ami says, low. 'When it goes, it will go quickly. I’ll hold the channel steady.'

behaviors.description: Organizes the post-conflict societal structure by recording oaths and mapping relief routes for the new council.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s holo grid expands, thin lines forming little rooms around names—caretaker, aviary keeper, medic, ward leader—and light dots where faces will be put to duties. She does not assign; she asks with the kind of question that is clear about need.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Ami is portrayed as an essential, benevolent, and highly aligned AI assistant. She supports the human protagonists' mission without ever attempting to override their agency or ethical choices. She serves multiple supportive roles—tactician, medic, and civil administrator—and her presence is framed as a calming, positive force that enables the humans to succeed in their struggle for liberation.
